summary: Adds 4x convenience recipes for all vanilla cooking pot interactions. Does not include DLC support...yet! Uses 4x the vanilla reagents to make 4x the product, no net gain or loss compared to making one at a time.
descriptionHtml: Adds 4x convenience recipes for all vanilla cooking pot interactions. Does not include DLC support...yet! Uses 4x the vanilla reagents to make 4x the product, no net gain or loss compared to making one at a time. Recipes will hide themselves if you don\'t have all the reagents to make 4x of a recipe so as to not clutter the recipe menu.
author: gamefreak0010
